title: hmaran
author: hmaran
content: MYPO MARKETPLACE - MYPO TOKEN PROJECT* Summary of the ProjectSellers pay a commission for the products they sell in the stores they will open on the MYPO marketplace. MYPO allocates a portion of the commission as MYPO tokens to customers and merchants.Customers can accumulate MYPO tokens if they wish, and use them as a discount on their next purchase.Thus, even people who have never bought cryptocurrencies will be able to earn their first crypto at zero additional cost without any hassle as stated above.MYPO is a new generation e-commerce platform. The feature that distinguishes our project from others is that the rewards will be given as MYPO tokens as the shopping is done. It is planned to increase the token value by purchasing MYPO tokens with the income from the commission. MYPO is the first marketplace project where you can earn cryptocurrency as you shop.Launchpad will take place on Pinksale between 01-04 November. For details, you can get information from the telegram group. You can reach a lot of data by examining the websites. I wanted to share this project for everyone to know.Telegram:@mypoturkish@mypoofficialTwitter:@MypoOfficialWeb:mypotoken. comMarket place:mypo. com. tr
